lang.name: Olha Vlasova
lang.aboutText: I have been working as a frontend developer for the last threeyears. Have experience with java script, html, css, sass/less, json,pixi.js, pixi-spine, Figma, Photoshop, I am confident with git. I haveexperience working with self-written game engines. I speak Englishat the level of communication.
